description:
Pulgini & Norton, LLP has a longstanding reputation for helping people throughout the state of Massachusetts with legal matters in the areas of real estate, land use and zoning, workers' compensation, personal injury and social security disability. John Pulgini and John Norton are Boston real estate lawyers who handle all of the firm's real estate matters, including real estate closings, real estate purchases and sales, land use and zoning, land conveyancing, condominium conversions, and all things real estate related. Attorneys Pulgini and Norton's practice also focuses on helping those who have sustained injuries on the job and require workers' compensation assistance. Finally, Attorneys Pulgini and Norton's law practice is also devoted to helping those who have been injured in accidents in Boston and the surrounding areas or due to the negligence of others.

For more information, click on the links below:

Boston Real Estate Attorney

Boston Workers' Compensation Lawyer

Boston Social Security Disability Lawyer
